general_advisory: Rice grains must be dried under sun. Monitor crops for pests and diseases. Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Harvest mature sugarcane below one inch of ground level.

advisory: Post harvesting - Monitor for rodents. Place Aluminium Phosphide with mud in rodent areas.
Vegetative stage - Manage Aphids by spraying Neem Based Pesticide. Then spray recommended insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Control Tobacco Caterpillar using Pheromone traps and insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Control aphids by spraying recommended insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Control aphids by spraying recommended insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Control Tobacco Caterpillar by setting up traps and spraying insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Hoeing and hand weeding. Irrigate the crop as needed.
Vegetative stage - Control Late Blight by spraying recommended pesticide.
Vegetative - Fruit formation stage - Control Fruit and shoot borer by spraying recommended pesticides.
Vegetative to Flowering - Control Thrips and Mealy bug by applying recommended pesticides.
During winters, prevent 'EUS' disease by applying Cifax. Feed fishes with oil cake bran mixture.
